source_company_business_description: Since 2018, Lapaire has been revolutionizing eye care in Africa by making trendy eyewear accessible to all! Over 400,000 people have already trusted the Lapaire expertise to test their eyesight in Côte d'Ivoire, Burkina Faso, Mali, Togo, Benin, and Uganda.
source_company_specialties: health, eyecare, retail, eyeglasses, optician, and glasses
